name: Super 8 Austin Airport, South

reviews.text: I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel and I must say I was pleasantly surprised with the overall experience. The hotel was very neat and clean, with a very nice appearance both inside and out. The hotel staff was very accomadating and extremely friendly. Mava, Dee and Maria are to be commended for their diligence and professionalism.
reviews.title: Super 8 ....Superb

likes.liked: — The bed was awesome. I slept very well!!

reviews.text: I had always thought of Super 8 as a step up from Motel 6 until I actually arrive at this hotel. It is a small hotel with service that is equal to some of the four and five star hotel chains for considerably less the cost.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel - I would higly reccommend it

likes.liked: — It was clean and good value for money

reviews.text: I will definitely use this hotel when I return to Austin next month.
reviews.title: The best in Austin!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We initialy wanted to stay in the centre of Austin but it was all looking a little too expensive and I began to look a little further out. It became apparent that we would have to drive to get into town so I looked for a cheaper out of town hotel and this one kept coming up. I researched this hotel on several different sites and all the reviews were excellent. Despite our reservations about the reputations of motel 8 we booked.
reviews.title: A great choice

likes.liked: — Computer & printer in room. We both could use a computer at same time.
likes.disliked: — Just one day breakfast bar wasn't restocked ASAP. Others days fine,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was fairly easy to find and we had a warm welcome on our arrival. We had booked a double suite but as I had a cold my lovely partner said they wanted their own bed. .. humph!! We managed to change room no problem. The room and bathroom were immaculate and a good size. There was a fridge and big tv and If you have a laptop there is free internet.
reviews.title: Best Super 8 Ever!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: OVERVIEW: A very friendly and well-run place that's a little out of the way.
reviews.title: Great Stay. Hard to believe it's a Super 8!

reviews.text: LOCATION: This is not in the more central areas of Austin, putting you about 5-10 minutes from Congress Street or the Capitol. It's in more of an industrial area, so there's not a lot of food options either. For us the service more than made up for location.
reviews.title: I was amazed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HOTEL: New property, well-run with special attention to details. Breakfast was quite good and equal to a Holiday Inn Express. They had evening desserts and snacks that were available for free. There's a little snack store with other amenities if you needed something. They also have a DVD collection you can borrow from.
reviews.title: Can't beat it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ROOM: Our standard king room was comfortable and clean. Very clean, well-maintained with a large bathroom. Free internet worked great. Mini-fridge was a nice bonus.
reviews.title: Absolutely great hotel...most accommodating staff ever/

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: RECOMMENDATIONS: If you're coming to Austin to party, this isn't your hotel. If you're coming for business or want to be sure to avoid crowds, you'll love this place.
reviews.title: Website makes promises hotel can't deliver

likes.disliked: — false/misleading offer on hotel web site

reviews.text: Stayed at the super8 on 1/2/09 after a 18 hour travel day from Asia. At check in I was given a goodie bag ( that contained a bottle of water, bag of chips, 3 fun size candy's,and some cheese crackers). The breakfast in the morning was great and lacked nothing that I could think of. This is the best breakfast I have seen yet that is free at a Super8. Rooms are very clean and the bed encourages deep sleep (and I did sleep deep). I didn't have to use the choices the pillow menu provides as the four that were on the bed were comfortable already. Very very friendly staff. I find myself repeating what other travelers have said but bottom line I have never been let down by tripadvisor. This place lived up to the expectations that the other reviews set and then a whole lot more because it was nicer than even the reviews. Loved this place. I will be staying here again on 1/16/09 for my flight back out of Texas and looking forward to it two weeks from now.
reviews.title: Better Than Trip Advisor Said -- Awesome

likes.liked: — The beds after a long flight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed at the super8 from 12/8 to 12/12. At checkin I was giving a goodie bag ( that contained a bottle of water, bag of chips, 3 fun size candy's,and some cheese crackers), iwas also told about their nightly complimentary dessert's from 6 to 9. and reminded about their superstart breakfast. once we got to our room everything was nice and clean. our king size bed was nice and compfy and were giving a pillow menu in case we didn't like our 6 standard pillows we got on our bed. next we go back to austin we will be staying there again.
reviews.title: great service, staff, and awesome room

reviews.text: This Super 8 Motel is downright awesome. When you check in, they give you a nice goodie bag filled with a bottled water and a bag of candies to keep your energy up or a way of saying thanks for checking in our hotel. The breakfast in the morning is good and they have things such as eggs, bacon and cereal to name a few. Also, there is FREE movies every night on Channel 11 after 6 pm every evening that you stay, so makes it even more worth the while. The massage that they claim is FREE is a massage chair. The front desk is very knowledgeable about the city overall and can tell you how to get anywhere. San Marcos is about 20 miles from the hotel and it has a outlet mall that everyone from all over the state comes to see. Overall, this SUPER 8 Motel is not your average motel, it's more than a Hilton or Holiday Inn can offer for cheaper! Go for it.
reviews.title: This isn't a normal Super 8, it's like a 5 star hotel.

likes.liked: — Customer Service, the staff made you feel you were at home at the hotel.
likes.disliked: — The last day of my day during breakfast, the ketchup bottles were empty and they didn't have any replacement.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a super Super 8; my wife and I stayed there for one night on our arrival in Austin in mid November then for two nights before our departure in early December.
reviews.title: Super Super Super 8!

likes.liked: — Convenient to the airport, very clean, and top notch staff
likes.disliked: — Bottom floor room 107 is noisy due to air conditioning units outside window.

reviews.text: We found the hotel to be exceptionaly clean, in excellent condition, and the staff helpful and courteous beyond belief. They provide a nice self-serve breakfast, either hot or cold, coffee all day long (very good coffee machine, by the way), and fruit available all day long. In fact the last evening we spent there, cake and cookies were available for guests. The family that run the hotel go out of their way to make travelers feel comfortable.
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not your ordinary Super 8! As mentioned in many of the other reviews it has everything you would need and more for a comfortable stay at a hotel. This was our second visit in the last two years. The hotel staff really cares about its guests. The beds and bedding are great! It is very clean! And a great value! We needed an early shuttle ride to the airport at 5:00am and even that was done with a smile and friendly conversation. The free breakfast bar did not open until 6 but they even made sure we had a coffee before we left. We will be going to Austin once every year...and I can't imagine staying anywhere else!
reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!

reviews.text: What can I say? When I heard I was booked at a Super 8 hotel for a biz trip my heart sank. I imagined a nasty, charmless little motel with planes going overhead and the smell of plastic and old cigarettes. But, no! Somehow this family has taken what certainly could have been a hum-drum cookie cutter establishment and turned it into a truly excellent hotel. As all the other reviewers have mentioned it is well-appointed and comfortable - a testimony to the strengths of a well-run family business.
reviews.title: Surprisingly good airport hotel

likes.liked: — Great bed, comfortable and quiet room near the airport

reviews.text: A word to the Holiday Inn and other chains - look at what the Kumars are doing and follow their example.
reviews.title: 5-star in my book

likes.liked: — Free internet, Free Starbucks coffee, Absolute value for money

reviews.text: I love this place so much that I'm writing a review while still staying here...thanks to free internet for all guests. Add to that all the Starbucks coffee you can drink, sausage biscuits & waffles for breakfast, 52-inch TV & iPod player speakers in my room, super comfortable king-size therapeutic bed. And the owner, Sam Kumar, even picked me up from the airport as part of the flexible shuttle service. All this for $89.00 a night! Need I say more?
reviews.title: As great as the reviews here said it would be!

reviews.text: We chose to stay at this Super 8 because of the reviews here on Trip Advisor. Great Advise! I can't add anything that hasn't already been said. We stayed for one night as my son had to be downtown at 5:30 am. Later in the day as I was leaving the man at the counter asked what they could do to make it better. I couldn't think of a thing!
reviews.title: Great Place to stay

likes.disliked: — Beds were a bit soft so you bounced around when you turned

aka: Super 8 Austin Airport, South Hotel Austin
description: Close to Convention Center, Sixth Street, University of Texas at Austin and Town Lake Super 8 Austin Airport, South hotel offers convenience to Austin-Bergstrom International Airport and downtown Austin attractions. Situated off Interstate 35 and Highway 71, our Austin hotel is minutes from the vibrant arts and music scene on 6th Street. Rely on our non-smoking, Austin, TX hotel for value. Take advantage of conveniences like free Wi-Fi Internet access, well-lit free parking and guest laundry facilities. Our gym makes it easy to squeeze a workout into your busy day, and we offer a sauna if you need to unwind. Begin each morning with free SuperStart continental breakfast with bacon and waffles. Kids 17 and under stay free with an adult. Super 8 Austin / Airport South hotel offers convenience to Austin-Bergstrom International Airport and downtown Austin attractions. Situated off Interstate 35 and Highway 71, our Austin hotel is minutes from the vibrant arts and music scene on 6th Street. Rely on our non-smoking, Austin, TX hotel for value. Take advantage of conveniences like free Wi-Fi Internet access, well-lit free parking and guest laundry facilities. Our gym makes it easy to squeeze a workout into your busy day, and we offer a sauna if you need to unwind. Begin each morning with free SuperStart continental breakfast with bacon and waffles. Kids 17 and under stay free with an adult. LOCAL ATTRACTIONSOur Austin hotel is convenient to downtown Austin entertainment and attractions. Take a walk around Lady Bird Lake and check out Zilker Botanical Garden along the way. For live music, head to the venues of 6th Street and the Warehouse District, or catch a performance at Austin City Limits. If a campus visit is in your plans, University of Texas is close to our hotel, and major events and conferences at Austin Convention Center are also nearby. Explore Capitol Visitors Center, hike along Town Lake or bring your family to Austin Childrens Museum.DINING OPTIONSSeveral restaurants are within easy reach of our Austin, TX hotel. Try fried catfish or oysters at Catfish Parlour or Mexican food at El Meson. Other choices include 888 Pan Asian and Threadgills Home Cooking. TRANSPORTATION SERVICESReach your terminal in minutes with free shuttle service to Austin-Bergstrom International Airport. Our friendly staff can provide you with details.
